en-us.learning_promise:
This unit will develop your students' understanding of energy, energy transfer, and collision. They'll explore ways of using observation skills as they anticipate the outcomes of changes in energy during a collision, describe the relationship between energy and speed, and predict how energy moves from place to place. They'll also broaden their understanding of energy conversion (potential and kinetic) by investigating a solution that converts energy from one form to another, testing the solution to improve and refine its function.

Your students will improve their communication skills as they engage in a range of collaborative discussions about energy, energy transfer, and collision.

lessons.lesson_description: Test your skills with Sofie’s mini-golf game!
lessons.lesson_sub_title: Test your skills with Sofie’s mini-golf game!

text.content: Sofie wants to test her mini-golf skills.
Sofie has been practicing. She thinks she can get a hole in one.
Build a mini-golf game like Sofie’s. Try to get a hole in one.
Here’s your challenge: create the program to get a hole in one.
Create the program. See if you can get a hole in one.

teacher_support.things_you_will_need:
(one for every two students)

- LEGO® Education SPIKE™ Essential Set

lessons.title: SPIKE Essential Lesson 1 Mini Mini-Golf

lessons.lesson_description: Have fun with Daniel’s bowling game! Can you get a strike?
lessons.lesson_sub_title: Have fun with Daniel’s bowling game! Can you get a strike?

text.content: Daniel is frustrated. He wants to be able to bowl like his friends.
Daniel thinks there must be a way that he can bowl too. He'd like to try bowling with a ramp.
Build a bowling game like Daniel’s and try it.
Here's your challenge: create the program to get a strike.
Create the program. Try to get a strike.

text.content: Modify your program to improve the bowling game.
Upgrade your bowling game to knock down different types of pins.

teacher_support.things_you_will_need:
(one for every two students)

- LEGO® Education SPIKE™ Essential Set
- Device with the LEGO® Education SPIKE™ App installed

lessons.title: SPIKE Essential Lesson 2 Bowling Fun

lessons.lesson_description: See how many goals you can score in Maria’s hockey game simulator!
lessons.lesson_sub_title: See how many goals you can score in Maria’s hockey game simulator!

text.content: Maria is excited to try the hockey game simulator.
Maria wants to find out how many goals she can score.
Build a hockey game like Maria’s. See how many goals you can score.
Here's your challenge: create the program for the hockey game. How many goals can you score in three tries?
Create the program. How many goals can you score in three tries?

- LEGO® Education SPIKE™ Essential Set
- Device with the LEGO® Education SPIKE™ App installed

lessons.title: SPIKE Essential Lesson 3 High Stick Hockey

lessons.lesson_description: Try to beat Leo’s current record for completing the maze!
lessons.lesson_sub_title: Try to beat Leo’s current record for completing the maze!

text.content: Leo won the maze competition. He completed the maze in only six tilts!
Leo wonders if he can do even better. He thinks he can complete the maze in just five tilts.
Build a maze like Leo’s. See if you can complete it in four tilts.
Here's your challenge: create the program for the maze. Try to complete it in four tilts.
Create the program. It counts the number of tilts it takes to complete the maze.

text.content: Modify your program to make the maze do something different when it's tilted.
Upgrade your maze by adding different obstacles.

teacher_support.things_you_will_need:
(one for every two students)

- LEGO® Education SPIKE™ Essential Set
- Device with the LEGO® Education SPIKE™ App installed

lessons.title: SPIKE Essential Lesson 4 A-Maze-Ing

lessons.lesson_description: Challenge yourself to use different bats to make the ball stop at the target!
lessons.lesson_sub_title: Challenge yourself to use different bats to make the ball stop at the target!

text.content: Leo notices a new game being revealed. He's eager to try it.
It looks challenging, but Leo thinks he can figure it out. He wants to be the first one to win this game.
Build a new game like Leo’s and try to win!
Here's your challenge: create the program that makes the ball stop at the target. It can't roll over the edge!
Create the program. See if you can make the ball stop at the target.

Upgrade your bat and see how it impacts the game.

lessons.title: SPIKE Essential Lesson 5 Avoid the Edge

lessons.lesson_description: Try Sofie’s junior pinball game and upgrade it to make it more unpredictable!
lessons.lesson_sub_title: Try Sofie’s junior pinball game and upgrade it to make it more unpredictable!

text.content: Sofie finds a game she doesn't recognize. It's a junior pinball game.
She thinks this junior pinball game will be easy. There's only one obstacle.
Build a junior pinball game like Sofie’s and try it out!
Here's your challenge: create the program that starts the junior pinball game.
Create the program. It starts the junior pinball game.

text.content: Modify the program to make the junior pinball game more unpredictable.
Upgrade your junior pinball game by adding different obstacles.

teacher_support.things_you_will_need:
(one for every two students)

- LEGO® Education SPIKE™ Essential Set
- Device with the LEGO® Education SPIKE™ App installed

lessons.title: SPIKE Essential Lesson 6 Junior Pinball

lessons.lesson_description: It’s time to create a new game for the school carnival!
lessons.lesson_sub_title: It’s time to create a new game for the school carnival!

text.content: The team is going to create a carnival at their school!
They wonder what games they should include.
Imagine what a school carnival could look like.
Here's your challenge: create a new carnival game. Use at least one motor or sensor.
Here's your challenge: create a new carnival game. Use at least one motor or sensor.

teacher_support.things_you_will_need:
(one for every two students)

- LEGO® Education SPIKE™ Essential Set
- Device with the LEGO® Education SPIKE™ App installed
- OPTIONAL: Additional materials for brainstorming (e.g., notebook paper, science notebook, etc.)

lessons.title: SPIKE Essential Lesson 7 Creative Carnival Games

en-us.title: Gecko Crazy Carnival Games U4
en-us.unit_plan_description: Let’s play a game (or two!) Maria, Daniel, Sofie, and Leo want you to play along with their most exciting arcade games. Which game will be your favorite?
en-us.unit_plan_subtitle: Playing with Energy Transfer and Collision
